FuncDef: The display snmp-agent target-host command displays information about all target hosts, including the IP address of each target host, VPN instance names, modes of sending trap messages, security names used to send trap messages, protocol versions, and security levels. The display snmp-agent target-host command displays information about all target hosts, including the IP address of each target host, VPN instance names, modes of sending trap messages, security names used to send trap messages, protocol versions, and security levels.
ExtraInfo: To view the configuration information about all target hosts, run the display snmp-agent target-host command.
